title: Commonwealth Games 2022: English pair claim gold in 10m synchronised diving
description: Watch English pair Noah Williams and Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix claim gold in 10m synchronised diving with a total of 333.06 at 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Tory leadership: Truss living costs plan won't touch sides, Sunak says
description: But she says her tax cuts would boost incomes, as the Tory leadership rivals row over the economy.

title: Commonwealth Games: Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix & Noah Williams win mixed synchronised 10m platform gold
description: England's Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix wins her third Commonwealth Games diving medal with mixed synchronised 10m platform gold alongside Noah Williams.

title: House of Zana boutique owner wins trademark row with Zara
description: Zara had said the name of House of Zana was "one small brush mark" from being the same as theirs.

title: BBC Radio 5 Live drops classified football results
description: The traditional reading out of the football results at 5pm on a Saturday is axed by BBC Radio.

title: Roger E. Mosley: Magnum P.I. actor dies aged 83 after car crash
description: Roger E. Mosley starred opposite Tom Selleck in all eight seasons of the original Magnum P.I.

title: Israel-Gaza: Ceasefire holds overnight after days of violence
description: After three days of violence in which 44 people died, fuel deliveries to Gaza have resumed.

title: Islington: Flooding in north London as water main bursts
description: A witness told the BBC that it was the worst flooding he had ever seen in London.

title: Cost of living: How you can save money on pet care
description: We've been speaking to a few experts who have given animal lovers their top tips on saving money.

title: Tory leadership: Cost of living crisis focus for contenders for PM job
description: There is pressure for candidates to explain what they will do to help with rising bills and how they'll pay for it.

title: Commonwealth Games: England's men win hockey bronze against South Africa
description: England's men secure a third successive Commonwealth hockey bronze as they come out on top in a nine-goal thriller against South Africa.

title: Frenkie de Jong: Barcelona midfielder 'wants to stay' says club president Laporta
description: Barcelona president Joan Laporta says Frenkie de Jong "wants to stay" at the club amid interest from Manchester United and Chelsea.

title: Leandro Lo: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu champion shot in São Paulo club
description: Doctors say Leandro Lo is brain dead after being shot; the suspect has handed himself in.

title: Qantas asks executives to work as baggage handlers for three months
description: The airline's head of operations has asked for 100 volunteers to fill the roles for three months.

title: London children strip-searched 650 times in two years
description: Almost a quarter of searches by the Met from 2018 to 2020 took place with no "appropriate adult" present.

title: June Spencer: Last original Archers cast member to retire
description: June Spencer, 103, has played matriarch Peggy in the long-running Radio 4 drama since 1951.

title: Full extent of NHS dentist shortage revealed
description: Nine in 10 UK dentists are not accepting new adult patients, while eight in 10 are refusing children.

title: Commonwealth Games closing ceremony line-up announced
description: West Midlands artists UB40, Jorja Smith and Dexys Midnight Runners will bring the games to a close.

title: Scottish exam results: When are they out and how will I get them?
description: Students are waiting to find out their National 5, Higher and Advanced Higher exam results.

title: Extreme drought: Dried-up Italian river reveals unexploded WWII bomb
description: Extreme drought and historic heat have caused the River Po's water levels to drop dramatically.

title: JetBlue airline boss over-hiring to beat staff exodus
description: Low-fare carrier JetBlue said it is a necessary policy when recruiting, as the industry re-starts.
